parameters.name: Project Name
parameters.description: Use '.' if your Project was obtained through option (1) of the menu. If it was obtained by option (12), enter the name of the Project that can be obtained in option (10).

parameters.name: Clean After
parameters.description: Clean up runs executed after the specified one

parameters.name: Clean Before
parameters.description: Clean up runs executed before the specified one

parameters.name: Clean But
parameters.description: Clean up all runs except the specified one

parameters.name: Dry Run
parameters.description: Print names of file to be removed without deleting them.

parameters.name: Keep Logs
parameters.description: Removes only temporary files but retains execution log entries and metadata.

parameters.name: Quiet
parameters.description: Do not print names of files removed
